max-log-rate.help: FortiCloud maximum log rate in MBps (0 = unlimited).
max-log-rate.name: max-log-rate

override.help: Overriding FortiCloud settings for this VDOM or use global settings.
override.name: override

options.help: Set FortiCloud log transmission priority to default.
options.name: default

options.help: Set FortiCloud log transmission priority to low.
options.name: low

upload-day.help: Day of week to roll logs.
upload-day.name: upload-day

upload-interval.help: Frequency of uploading log files to FortiCloud.
upload-interval.name: upload-interval

options.help: Upload log files to FortiCloud once a day.
options.name: daily

options.help: Upload log files to FortiCloud once a week.
options.name: weekly

options.help: Upload log files to FortiCloud once a month.
options.name: monthly

upload-option.help: Configure how log messages are sent to FortiCloud.
upload-option.name: upload-option

options.help: Log to the hard disk and then upload logs to FortiCloud.
options.name: store-and-upload

options.help: Log directly to FortiCloud in real time.
options.name: realtime

options.help: Log directly to FortiCloud at 1-minute intervals.
options.name: 1-minute

options.help: Log directly to FortiCloud at 5-minute intervals.
options.name: 5-minute

upload-time.help: Time of day to roll logs (hh:mm).
upload-time.name: upload-time

results.help: Override global FortiCloud logging settings for this VDOM.
results.name: override-setting
